63.eng-name: Merits of the Helpers in Madinah (Ansaar)

hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir bin `Abdullah:That he heard Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) saying, "When the people of Quraish did not believe me (i.e. the story of my Night Journey), I stood up in Al-Hijr and Allah displayed Jerusalem in front of me, and I began describing it to them while I was looking at it

chapter.eng-name: The narration about Al-Isra (Journey by Night)
